name: CAEDRMetadata
desc: Metadata describing how extended dynamic range (EDR) values should be tone mapped.

items.name: class var hlg: CAEDRMetadata
items.desc: Extended dynamic range (EDR) metadata for the Hybrid Log-Gamma (HLG) transfer function.

items.name: class func hdr10(displayInfo: Data?, contentInfo: Data?, opticalOutputScale: Float) -> CAEDRMetadata
items.desc: Creates EDR metadata for HDR10 content based on mastering display color information and content light levels.

items.name: class func hdr10(minLuminance: Float, maxLuminance: Float, opticalOutputScale: Float) -> CAEDRMetadata
items.desc: Creates EDR metadata for HDR10 content based on the luminance characteristics of a mastering display.
